snippet: A bill to create tax-deferred savings accounts for the disabled would make life more secure for the beneficiaries and for their parents and other caregivers.
abstract: Editorial laments that sensible bill like the Achieving a Better Life Experience Act has been hung up in Congress because it requires a tweak of the tax code and spending a little money; urges Congress to vote on the law, which is a boon for people with disabilities, has strong bipartisan support and will assuage anxiety of family and caregivers of those with disabilities.
lead_paragraph: A bill to create tax-deferred savings accounts for the disabled would make life more secure for the beneficiaries and for their parents and other caregivers.

headline.main: Saving a Future for Those With Disabilities
